actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the authority of the Corps of Engineers with respect to bank stabilization and shoreline erosion along the Missouri River.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to undertake measures to alleviate bank erosion and related problems associated with reservoir releases along the Missouri River between Fort Peck Dam, Montana, and Gavins Point Dam, South Dakota and Nebraska. Requires the cost of such measures to be apportioned among project purposes as a joint-use operation and maintenance expense. Permits the Secretary to acquire interests in affected areas from willing sellers.

titles.title: A bill to amend the authority of the Corps of Engineers with respect to bank stabilization and shoreline erosion along the Missouri River.
